description: Create column 3000 at index 1 based on column M|IDN using expression grel:filter(cells['M|100'].value.split(''), v, v.startsWith('a'))[0].slice(1)

expression:
grel:if(
value.contains(','),
'a' + value.split(',')[0].trim() + 'd' + value.split(',')[1].trim(),
'P' + value
)
description:
Text transform on cells in column 3000 using expression grel:if(
value.contains(','),
'a' + value.split(',')[0].trim() + 'd' + value.split(',')[1].trim(),
'P' + value
)
Text transform on cells in column 3000 using expression grel:value.split('¬')[0].trim() + 'c' + value.split('¬')[1].trim()
